titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes moste excellent Maiestie, beyng credibly enfourmed that many vagaboundes, roges, idle persons, and masterlesse men, hauyng nothyng to liue on, do dayly resort to the cities of London and Westminster, and the suburbes of the same ...
Proclamations. 1576-12-14
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Iugge, printer to the Queenes Maiestie. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Ordering vagrants to return to their home areas.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
